All: A compilation of all playlists, given in their alphabetical order.
From_Other_Entertainment: Music from other sources, such as: video games, movies, or TV.

Pop: Pop mix, due to overwhelming amount of artists and songs, this playlist is limited to artists who are not currently active and songs released at least a decade before this playlist was made in 2023.
